column4: my taskbar (clock and all, when i try to switch programs by clicking the button nothing happens) keeps freezing and I can't figure out why. At first I thoguht it was firefox but now it seems it is not.
exactly when you install that opera u have no idea what it is doing
but why would updating opera mess things up?
i was just making a lame political point about non-free SW.... its probably not opera
